biotools.summary: VisANT is an integrative visual analysis tool for biological networks and pathways that contains modules for querying and integrating KEGG pathways with expression data. VisANT is java-based, and can be run as a java applet, as a java web application, or downloaded and run locally. New functions allow determination of over-representation and expression enrichment, integrated search and navigation of disease and drug hierarchies, drug/disease annotation, etc.
